statements: SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, borrower_id, tokenized_value FROM peer_to_peer_lending_assets WHERE lender_id = 100;
SELECT asset_name, lender_id, date_borrowed FROM peer_to_peer_lending_assets WHERE borrower_id = 50;
SELECT borrower_id, lender_id, tokenized_value FROM peer_to_peer_lending_assets WHERE date_borrowed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, tokenized_value FROM peer_to_peer_lending_assets WHERE lender_id = 200;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, tokenized_value FROM peer_to_peer_lending_assets WHERE borrower_id = 1 ORDER BY tokenized_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM peer_to_peer_lending_assets WHERE lender_id = 3 AND date_borrowed >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM peer_to_peer_lending_assets WHERE tokenized_value BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT lender_id FROM peer_to_peer_lending_assets WHERE date_borrowed < '2022-05-01';
SELECT asset_name, borrower_id FROM peer_to_peer_lending_assets WHERE borrower_id = 2 ORDER BY date_borrowed ASC;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, token_amount FROM assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, token_amount FROM assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT loan_id, lender_id, borrower_id, asset_id, amount, status FROM loans WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT loan_id, lender_id, borrower_id, asset_id, amount, status FROM loans WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE token_amount > 100 ORDER BY asset_name DESC
SELECT asset_name, token_amount FROM assets WHERE asset_id = 2
SELECT asset_name, token_amount, loan_id, amount FROM assets JOIN loans ON assets.asset_id = loans.asset_id
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY loan_id ASC
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE status = 'approved'
SELECT * FROM tokens ORDER BY token_name DESC;
SELECT token_name, token_value FROM tokens WHERE token_value > 100;
SELECT user_email FROM users WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE token_id = '2d7d1b44-9515-4a92-b89c-eb57670a0e1f';
SELECT * FROM tokens WHERE token_value > 100 ORDER BY token_name DESC
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT token_name, token_value FROM tokens WHERE token_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.sender_id
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM TokenizedAssets;
SELECT lender_id, lender_name, lender_contact, lender_balance FROM Lenders WHERE lender_balance > 1000;
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_duration FROM Borrowers WHERE loan_amount < 5000 AND loan_duration > 12;
SELECT * FROM LoanTransactions WHERE transaction_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_value, asset_id FROM TokenizedAssets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM TokenizedAssets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM TokenizedAssets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_duration FROM Borrowers WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT lender_name, lender_balance FROM Lenders WHERE lender_balance < 50000 ORDER BY lender_balance ASC;

SELECT lender_name, borrower_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Lenders l INNER JOIN LoanTransactions lt ON l.lender_id = lt.lender_id INNER JOIN Borrowers b ON b.borrower_id = lt.borrower_id WHERE lt.transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, user_id FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_duration FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM Assets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions JOIN Users ON Transactions.user_id = Users.user_id;
SELECT asset_name, total_tokens FROM Assets JOIN TokenizedAssets ON Assets.asset_id = TokenizedAssets.asset_id WHERE total_tokens > 1000;
